sentences: Ma saan sellest samamoodi aru kui sina.
Eelmine pidu lõppes kaklusega, kas täna läheb samamoodi.
Ja olgugi et inimesed elavad ja surevad isemoodi, maetakse nad enamasti samamoodi.
context: Samamoodi is an Estonian adverb that means 'in the same way' or 'likewise'. It's used to indicate similarity in manner, method, or behavior. In its first usage as shown in the dictionary definition, it functions as an adverb (adv) and can be translated as 'samal viisil' (in the same way), 'samal kombel' (in the same manner), or simply 'samuti' (also/too). The word can also function as an indeclinable adjective meaning 'samasugune' (of the same kind/similar).
